full_summary:
# Request for Proposal for Gages, Pressure, Dial Indicating

**Reference Number:** cb-740-99351170
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241963/A

**Publication Date:** 2024-02-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-20 14:00:00

**Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

The Department of National Defence seeks proposals for the supply of dial indicating pressure gages as detailed below.

**Delivery Locations:**

- CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
- CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Quantity:**

- 10 units for Item 1
- 2 units for Item 2
- 10 units for Item 3
- 2 units for Item 4

The required products are:

* GSIN: N6685, NSN: 01-7075012 (Item 1 and 2)
* GSIN: N6685, NSN: 01-7074991 (Item 3 and 4)

All bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will be rejected.

Please note that this requirement does not offer exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation. Requests for such mitigation will not be considered.

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Supporting Documents:**

Attachments to this tender notice include:

* Amendment 1 - English
* Amendment 1 - French
* Amendment 2 - English
* Amendment 2 - French
* RFP Clauses - English
* RFP Clauses - French

These documents can be found on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

**Contact Information:**

Ashley Nadeau-Weeks
Email: ashley.nadeau-weeks@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (555) 555-5555

The deadline for submission is 2024-03-20 14:00:00. Bids received after this time will not be accepted.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) agreement.

Please ensure that your bid complies with the rules and regulations outlined in the supporting documents. If you
